Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2500 COLUMBIA AVENUE, LANCASTER, Pennsylvania, 17603, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Armstrong World Industries manufactures and sells fiber and metal ceiling systems and complementary ceiling products to the residential, commercial, and institutional construction and remodeling industries. The company also operates a joint venture that manufactures ceiling grid suspension systems. Armstrong's reportable segments include mineral fiber and architectural specialties. It generates maximum revenue from the mineral fiber segment. The company has a presence in the United States, Canada, and Latin America.
